fullDescription.intro:
Reads one VCF File and associate it to an optional SAMPLE name. It currently only supports one sample/call per VCF.
See also the node Read VCF files.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Ignore VCF data with a quality lower than this value
vcf file. Valid extensions are: vcf, vcf.gz, vcf.bgz

ports.outPort: VCF data and the sample name
